title: Oxy New БМУR/1TM-1TM
description: Oxy New is a stylish, modern and comfortable sofa that fits perfectly into the interior of a modern apartment and can be easily converted into a bed. The sofa consists of two sections and a niche for storing bedding. The transformation mechanism `Eurobook` will easily make a spacious bed out of a stylish and comfortable sofa. The softness of a product is characterized by both its appearance and filling. The Oxy New sofa has two types of additional cushions, which reduce the depth of the seat and add comfort during operation. A wide range of upholstery that is offered to choose from will help the Oxy New sofa become an integral part of the interior. Whether it is a substitute for leather or textiles - it's up to you.

general.configuration: spring-snake, spring block Pocket Spring, PPU

warranty.serviceType: For Warranty Claims or Any Product Related Issues Please Email at operations@trevifurniture.com
warranty.notCovered: The Warranty Does Not Cover Damages Due To Usage Of The Product Beyond Its Intended Use And Wear & Tear In The Natural Course Of Product Usage.
